# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a default form style.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

Don’t call this initializer directly. Instead, use the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/FormStyle/automatic] static variable to create this style:

```swift
Form {
   ...
}
.formStyle(.automatic)
```
title: init()
